name: CRAZY MAZE
description: CRAZY MAZE is an arcade game that is all about getting out of the maze filled with many traps that continuously disturb your gameplay.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
